mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_act_jiugongge_awards /* 配置 */ ( id /* */ ,awards_name /* 奖项名称 */ ,jwid /* */ ,awards_value /* */ ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* */ ,#{awardsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 奖项名称 */ ,#{jwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* */ ,#{awardsValue,jdbcType=INTEGER} /* */ )
mapper.select: SELECT waja.id /* */ ,waja.awards_name /* 奖项名称 */ ,waja.jwid /* */ ,waja.awards_value /* */ FROM wx_act_jiugongge_awards AS waja /* 配置 */ WHERE id = #{id} /* 序号 */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wx_act_jiugongge_awards /* 配置 */ WHERE id = #{id} /* 序号 */
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM wx_act_jiugongge_awards AS waja /* 配置 */ WHERE 1=1

SELECT waja.id /* */ ,waja.awards_name /* 奖项名称 */ ,waja.jwid /* */ ,waja.awards_value /* */ ,jwj.name FROM wx_act_jiugongge_awards AS waja /* 配置 */ LEFT JOIN jw_web_jwid AS jwj ON waja.jwid=jwj.jwid WHERE 1=1
LIMIT #{startRow} /* 开始序号 */ ,#{pageSize} /* 每页显示条数 */
SELECT waja.id /*奖项id*/ ,waja.awards_name /* 奖项名称 */ ,waja.jwid /* */ ,waja.awards_value /*奖项值*/ FROM wx_act_jiugongge_awards AS waja /* 配置 */ WHERE waja.jwid = #{jwid}

SELECT waja.id /*奖项id*/ ,waja.awards_name /* 奖项名称 */ ,waja.jwid /* */ ,waja.awards_value /*奖项值*/ FROM wx_act_jiugongge_awards AS waja /* 配置 */ WHERE waja.awards_value = #{value} AND waja.jwid = #{jwid}
